Package universum.studios.android.crypto

Provides tools that may be used to support cryptographic operations in an Android application.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Crypto
    Crypto defines an interface for implementations that may be used to provide two-side cryptographic operations: encryption and decryption of a desired data.
    Decrypto
    Decrypto defines an interface for implementations that may be used to provide one-side cryptographic operation: decryption of a desired data that are encrypted.
    Encrypto
    Encrypto defines an interface for implementations that may be used to provide one-side cryptographic operation: encryption of a desired data that are decrypted.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cryptography  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CryptographyException
    An exception that may be thrown due to failed cryptographic operation.

Package universum.studios.android.crypto Description

Provides tools that may be used to support cryptographic operations in an Android application.
Author:
Martin Albedinsky
